WSO2 Complex Event Processor (CEP) Deployment Guide
Deploying the WSO2 CEP correctly on your infrastructure is a vital task for the success of the usage of the CEP. You should first analyze the requirement and then select the best matching deployment mode. There are different set of possible deployment modes with different configurations.
Available Deployment options
Standalone Deployment Guide : Describes the default standalone installation and deployment of the CEP
Webapp Deployment Guide : Contains the information on deploying the CEP on an Application Server, this particular guide explains the deployment of an existing Tomcat Servlet Container.
Other Resources
The WSO2 Oxygen Tank Library : The Library contains articles, tutorials, presentations, and other knowledge base items published on The Oxygen Tank on different styles of deployments.
